name: Zig Zag Santa - Merry Christmas Games
name_original: Zig Zag Santa - Merry Christmas Games
description:
🎅 Merry Christmas to all 🔔 and it's 🎅 time to deliver some gifts, Play and be a part in spreading the wondrous joys in zig zag Santa gift delivery on this Christmas event of 2017. Slide through the snowy Christmas town.

❄️ Hold the Zig Zag Santa and then release to change the directions towards grabbing a precious gift. After certain time rewards will be gifted, this will help you to change the character of the game and cart to side. Play, ride to Slide & Collect X-mas gifts with zig zag Santa game.

🏅- A lot of achievements.

🎁 - A lot of Gifts!

🏆 - Leaderboards !

🎭 - A lot of Skins!

⛄ - And much More !

❄️ Note: Collect all the Christmas Games presents and do not crash...

🎄 ENJOY !!!!!! 🎅🎅🎅

🎅Slide the Zig Zag Santa to collect the christmas games 🎁 gifts & presents!🎅
